channel.title: PI Trade Help
channel.description: On my server and almost all RSPS, if you trade someone and then you moved, and the other player accpted ur trade, then it will open the trade interface, but i don't need it to open i need it to send request again because he moved. Hope you understood.

item.title: PI Trade Help
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

this is not a spoonfeeding community.

you try to figure out some type of cheaphax. then let us know how far you’ve gotten

Read full topic

item.title: PI Trade Help
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:519404”]something like

lastX, lastY would have to be used in process

I assume it would have to use process cause of the 600ms cycle ?[/quote]Yes like this: lastX, lastY, can you tell me the code and where/under wht i should add it. ?

Read full topic

item.title: PI Trade Help
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

On my server and almost all RSPS, if you trade someone and then you moved, and the other player accpted ur trade, then it will open the trade interface, but i don’t need it to open i need it to send request again because he moved. Hope you understood.

Read full topic
